scraped_articles.title: 45 Funny Monday Quotes to Start Your Week with Laughter
scraped_articles.meta_description: These funny Monday quotes will lighten your mood and set a positive mindset for the days ahead.
scraped_articles.content:
45 Funny Monday Quotes to Start Your Week with Laughter

These quotes will lighten your mood and set a positive mindset for the days ahead.

45 Funny Monday Quotes to Start Your Week with Laughter

Do your Monday mornings feel heavy? Well, don't worry! We have the solution to start your week with a smile.

In this article, we have selected 45 funny Monday quotes to bring laughter into your day. These funny Monday quotes will lighten your mood and set a positive mindset for the days ahead.

Funny Monday Quotes

So, grab your coffee and take a relaxing. Let's get ready to start your week with a good laugh with these funny Monday quotes!

A. Funny Monday Quotes for A Joyful Week

  • "Dear Monday, my momma don't like you and she likes everyone."
  • "Monday is like a math problem. Add the irritation, subtract the sleep, multiply the problems, and divide the happiness."
  • "Monday is a fresh start. It's never too late to dig in and begin a new journey of success."
  • "Monday should be optional."
  • "Monday is the day when reality hits you after a weekend of freedom."
  • "Monday is the day to be back at your passion, be kick-ass, and take names."
  • "Monday: Nothing a bit of coffee and a lot of sarcasm can't fix."
  • "Monday is the perfect day to correct last week's mistakes. Or pretend they never happened. Your choice."

  • "Monday is a fresh start to the week. It's a chance to set a new tone for the days ahead. Or, you know, hit snooze a few more times."

  • “Warning: Going to sleep on Sunday night will cause Monday.”

  • "May your coffee be strong and your Monday be short."
  • “Monday got me like CTRL + ALT + DELETE, end task.”
  • “Look on the bright side, at least Mondays only happen once a week.”
  • “The worst part of my Mondays is hearing you complain about Mondays.”
  • “What did I say about waking me on Monday? Don’t.”

B. Funny Monday Quotes to Boost Your Mood

"If Monday had a face, I'd punch it."

  • "I haven't had this bad of a Monday since last Monday."
  • "Monday is the day that falls between 'I can't believe it's Friday already' and 'I can't believe it's only Tuesday'."
  • “Monday is great if I can spend it in bed. I’m a man of simple pleasures, really.” - Arthur Darvill
  • “Does running away from Mondays count as cardio?” -Our Mindful Life
  • "Coffee in hand, sparkle in my eye, smile on my face... yep, I'd say it's Monday!"

  • "Monday is the day when reality hits you after a weekend of blissful ignorance."
  • "Monday is the day to be grateful for coffee and to forget about the weekend's regrets."

  • "Monday is the day that gets us all back on the bus. It's like the driver said, 'Hey, I'm going to take you halfway to work and let you off. You walk from here, okay?'"
  • "Dear Monday, I want to break up. I'm seeing Tuesday and dreaming about Friday. It's not me, it's you."
  • "On Mondays, I'm a coffee-powered superhero. By Friday, I'm barely a functioning adult."
  • "Monday blues? I'll take a rain check and wait for Friday to come."
  • “Mondays and Fridays are just twenty-four-hour stretches of time with different names.” -Julie Murphy

  • “Candy is nature’s way of making up for Mondays.” -Rebecca Gober
  • “You don’t need a New Year to make a change. All you need is a Monday.” 

C. Funny Monday Quotes to Uplift Your Spirit

  • “If I didn’t need money, my Mondays would have been gracious! Sadly, I need money; so, I have to wake up early and go to work.”
  • “Just reminding everyone that it’s Monday, just in case any of you were feeling overly optimistic.”
  • "Monday is the day to be setting new goals... after just five more minutes of sleep."
  • “Monday sets the tone for the week. Be a beast today.” 
  • “So, Monday. We meet again. We will never be friends, but maybe we can move past our mutual enmity toward a more positive partnership.” -Julio Alexi Genao
  • “What’s the best part of Monday? The ending.”

“There should be a holiday for all the brave people who show up to work on Mondays.”

  • “Okay, it’s Monday, but who said Mondays have to suck? Be a rebel and have a great day anyway.” -Kimberly Jimenez
  • “Monday is like the person who showed up to a party uninvited. Like you’ll allow it… but how rude!”
  • “It’s Monday again? I wasn’t even finished with my Saturday yet.”

  • "I'm not a morning person, but if I woke up every Monday morning next to you, I'd learn to love them."
  • “If each day is a “gift,” I’d like to know where I can return Monday.”

  • “I heard about history repeating itself but this Monday thing has got to stop.”
  • “One day on Mercury lasts about 1,408 hours. The same as one Monday on Earth.”
  • “Hello, Monday. May I ask you a question? Why are you always back so quickly? Don’t you have a hobby?”

scraped_articles.title: 5 Most Unusual Phobia You May Never Heard About
scraped_articles.meta_description: These phobias, while unusual and seemingly irrational to others, can have a profound impact on the lives of those who experience them.
scraped_articles.content:
5 Most Unusual Phobia You May Never Heard About

These phobias, while unusual and seemingly irrational to others, can have a profound impact on the lives of those who experience them.

5 Most Unusual Phobia You May Never Heard About

Arachibutyrophobia (Fear of peanut butter sticking to the roof of the mouth)

Arachibutyrophobia is a highly specific fear where individuals are terrified of peanut butter sticking to the roof of their mouth.

While the fear may sound trivial, for those who suffer from it, the anxiety can be intense and overwhelming.

The texture and the sensation of peanut butter adhering to the palate can trigger severe discomfort, panic attacks, and avoidance behaviors. This phobia is often linked to a broader fear of choking or the inability to swallow, and it can severely limit a person's diet and enjoyment of certain foods.

Nomophobia (Fear of being without a mobile phone)

Nomophobia, short for "no mobile phone phobia," is a modern fear that has emerged with the widespread use of smartphones.

Those who suffer from nomophobia experience anxiety and distress at the thought of losing their phone, running out of battery, or being in an area without cell service. This fear can lead to compulsive phone checking, reduced social interactions, and a constant need to stay connected.

The dependency on mobile devices for communication, information, and social media engagement exacerbates this phobia, highlighting the psychological impact of technology on modern life.

Hippopotomonstrosesquipedaliophobia (Fear of long words)

This phobia can cause significant distress for individuals, especially in educational or professional settings where long and complex words are commonly used.

The anxiety stems from the fear of mispronouncing or misunderstanding long words, leading to embarrassment or ridicule.

People with this phobia may avoid reading aloud, public speaking, or situations where they might encounter lengthy words.

The irony of the phobia's long name adds a layer of humor, but for sufferers, the fear is genuine and can impact their confidence and communication skills.

Xanthophobia (Fear of the color yellow)

Xanthophobia is an unusual phobia characterized by an intense fear of the color yellow and can include fear of yellow objects, flowers, clothing, or even the sun.

The sight of the color yellow can provoke anxiety, panic attacks, and a desire to flee from the source of the color.

Xanthophobia can severely limit an individual's daily activities, as they may go to great lengths to avoid any encounters with the color yellow.

This phobia is often rooted in a traumatic experience associated with the color or an irrational association with negative outcomes.

Plutophobia (Fear of wealth)

This phobia can manifest in various ways, including fear of financial success, handling money, or interacting with wealthy individuals.

Those who suffer from plutophobia may associate wealth with negative traits such as greed, corruption, or loss of personal values.

They might avoid opportunities for financial gain or sabotage their own success to prevent becoming wealthy.

This fear can lead to significant stress, limited career progression, and a complicated relationship with money, impacting overall life satisfaction and mental well-being.

scraped_articles.title: Philippines Builds Mega Stadium to Hold Taylor Swift Concert
scraped_articles.meta_description: Philippines announced plans to build a stadium that accommodates big concerts.
scraped_articles.content:
Philippines Builds Mega Stadium to Hold Taylor Swift Concert

Philippines Builds Mega Stadium to Hold Taylor Swift Concert

Through The Clark International Airport and Corp. (CIAC), the Philippines announced plans to build a stadium that accommodates big concerts for world superstars like Taylor Swift.

In an interview with local media, CIAC President and CEO Arrey Perez stated that the stadium will be near the Clark International Airport (CRK) in Pampanga.

Perez specifically asked Taylor Swift to perform when the stadium is completed. The inaugural party is planned for 2028.

"The Philippines has always been a music-loving industry, whenever there is an international concert that hits. Especially with Clark Airport, it will be very easy to watch (concerts) when the facilities are here," said Arrey Perez, quoting PhilSTAR Life, Sunday, July 14.

The stadium is expected to be built on 40 hectares of land for 32 billion Pesos or around US$550 million.

"When we had the vision to have an entertainment center in Clark, we did a lot of promotion," Perez said.

The stadium's financing comes from investments from local and international companies from Singapore and the United States.

"Some parties are willing to work together. And when it comes to this project, it will be a public-private partnership. It's a very big project, it's forty hectares and it's worth more than 30 billion Pesos, so we really need a partnership with the government and the private sector to build the project," Perez said.

trstdly.com

With the plan, Indonesia will have a new rival to host significant music concerts from international acts.

In the last ten years, Indonesia has had to compete with Singapore, Thailand, and Malaysia to attract international musicians to Southeast Asia.

trstdly.com

scraped_articles.title: Never Have I Ever Questions: The Ultimate List for Fun and Excitement
scraped_articles.meta_description: Let’s dive in and explore the world of Never Have I Ever!
scraped_articles.content:
Never Have I Ever Questions: The Ultimate List for Fun and Excitement

Never Have I Ever is a fun game people love playing at parties or gatherings. It’s a great way to learn interesting things about your friends and have lots of laughs.

In this article, we’ll share a huge list of Never Have I Ever questions for you to use. Whether you’re playing with kids, teens, or adults, you’ll find plenty of good questions here. Let’s dive in and explore the world of Never Have I Ever!

What is Never Have I Ever?

Before we get to the questions, let’s quickly explain how to play Never Have I Ever:

  1. Players sit in a circle
  2. Each person takes turns saying, “Never have I ever…” followed by something they’ve never done
  3. Anyone who has done that thing must put a finger down or take a drink (for adults)
  4. The goal is to be the last person with fingers still up

It’s a simple game, but it can lead to funny stories and interesting conversations. Now, let’s look at some great questions to ask!

Funny Never Have I Ever Questions

These questions are sure to get people laughing:

Never have I ever pretended to laugh at a joke I didn’t understand

scraped_articles.title: Funny Quotes About Friends That Capture the Humor of BFF
scraped_articles.meta_description: Funny quotes about friends remind us of the silly, hilarious, and unforgettable times we’ve spent together.
scraped_articles.content:
Funny Quotes About Friends That Capture the Humor of BFF

Funny quotes about friends remind us of the silly, hilarious, and unforgettable times we’ve spent together.

Funny Quotes About Friends That Capture the Humor of BFF

Isn’t friendship one of the most precious gifts that bring happiness into our lives?

When we of about our friends, we often remember the times they made us laugh until our stomach hurt. And funny quotes about friends capture these joyful moments perfectly.

Funny quotes about friends remind us of the silly, hilarious, and unforgettable times we’ve spent together.

In this post, we’ve gathered some funny quotes about friends that you can share to your besties. These quotes show how amazing it is to have friends who understand us.

So, let's dive into some funny quotes about friends that will remind you of the amazing friends in your life! Oh, and they will surely bring a smile to your face too!

Short Funny Quotes about Friends

  • “Good friends don’t let you do stupid things… alone.” —Unknown
  • “You and I are more than friends, we’re like a really small gang.” —Unknown

  • “A snowball in the face is surely the perfect beginning to a lasting friendship.” —Unknown

  • “Finding friends with the same mental disorder: priceless.” —Unknown

  • “You drink too much. Cuss too much. You have questionable morals. You’re everything I ever wanted in a friend.” —Unknown

  • “Never let your friends be lonely, disturb them all the time.” —Unknown

  • “True friends don’t judge each other. They judge other people together.” —Unknown

  • “It’s the friends you can call up at 4 a.m that matter.” —Marlene Dietrich

  • “We’ll always be friends because you match my level of crazy.” —Unknown

  • “Only your real friends will tell you when your face is dirty.” —Sicilian Proverb

  • “Good times and crazy friends make the best memories.” —Unknown

  • “Having those weird conversations with your friend and thinking ‘If anyone heard us, we’d be put in a mental hospital.’” —Unknown

  • “Every normal person needs a crazy friend.” —Unknown

  • “Friends offer free therapy.” —Unknown

  • “You don’t have to be crazy to be my friend, but it surely helps!” —Unknown

  • “Best friends loan out DVDs knowing that they’ll never be seen again.” —Unknown

Short Funny Quotes about Friends

  • “Do you think I’m crazy? You should see me with my best friend.” —Unknown

  • “Good friends discuss their sex lives. Best friends talk about poop.” —Unknown

  • “A true friend never gets in your way unless you happen to be going down.” —Arnold H. Glasgow

  • “Friends are people who know you really well and like you anyway.” —Greg Tamblyn

  • “You don’t have to be crazy to be my friend. I’ll train you.” —Unknown

  • “Friends buy you food. Best friends eat your food.” —Unknown

Crazy and Funny Quotes About Friends

  • “We’ve been friends for so long, I can’t remember which one of us is the bad influence.” —Unknown

  • “I’d take a bullet for you. Not in the head, of course. But like in the leg or something.” —Unknown

  • “A good friend will help you move. But a best friend will help you move a dead body.” —Jim Hayes

  • “I will text you 50 times in a row and feel no shame. You’re my friend, you literally signed up for this.” —Unknown

  • “Best friends know how crazy you are and still choose to be seen with you in public.” —Unknown

  • “We’ll be the old ladies causing trouble in the nursing home.” —Unknown

  • “Thank you for still being my friend, despite the fact that you are completely aware of every terrifying, raunchy, explicit detail of my life.” —Unknown

  • “Best friend: the one that you can be mad at only for a short period of time because you have important stuff to tell them.” —Unknown

  • “Friends give you a shoulder to cry on. But best friends are ready with a shovel to hurt the person that made you cry.” —Unknown

  • “We’ll be best friends forever because you already know too much.” —Unknown

  • “If you have one friend who understands you on your level of crazy… one friend is all you will ever need.” —Unknown

  • “Best friends don’t care if your house is clean. They care if you have wine.” —Unknown

  • “Real friendship is when your friend comes over to your house and then you both just take a nap.” —Unknown

  • “God made us best friends because he knew our moms couldn’t handle us as sisters.” —Unknown

  • “Things are never quite as scary when you’ve got a best friend.” —Bill Watterson

  • “We are best friends. Always remember that if you fall, I will pick you up… after I finish laughing.” —Unknown

  • “Strangers think I’m quiet. My friends think I’m outgoing. My best friends know that I’m completely insane!” —Unknown

scraped_articles.title: Crush Quotes: 35 Cute and Funny Texts for Them
scraped_articles.meta_description: These crush quotes capture the excitement, nervousness, and joy of having a crush.
scraped_articles.content:
Crush Quotes: 35 Cute and Funny Texts for Them

These crush quotes capture the excitement, nervousness, and joy of having a crush.

Crush Quotes: 35 Cute and Funny Texts for Them

Have you ever felt your heart beat faster when you see someone you really like?

Maybe you can’t stop thinking about someone and get nervous when they’re around.

That's what having a crush is all about.

Having a crush is a special feeling that many people experience.

And because it’s full of emotions, people start writing crush quotes to express their feelings.

Crush quotes are short sayings that capture the excitement, nervousness, and joy of having a crush.

These crush quotes will also remind you that crushes are a part of growing up.

So, let's dive into the world of crush quotes and discover how they capture the feeling of having a crush!

trstdly © 2024

Cute and Funny Crush Quotes to Text Them

1. "Someone stole my heart. Can I check your pockets?”

2. “Because of you, half the time I don’t even know that I’m smiling.”

3. “I pretended to look around, but I was looking at you.”

4. “Ever since I met you, it hasn’t been the same. All you’ve got me doing is drawing hearts around your name.”
5. “If my love for you is a crime, I want to be the most wanted criminal.”

6. “Some things have to remain a secret, but you and I don’t.”

7. "Please stop looking so attractive, I'm trying to stop liking you."

8. “You know that feeling when your head says no, but your heart says yes? It’s wrong, but it feels so right? I wish we could be together.”

9. “I’ve found this new disease, it’s called LOVE. I know it is contagious because you gave it to me.”

10. “I want to ask you out, but I can’t find the right words. And my confidence level is low.”

11. “When I’m alone, I think of so many things to say to you, but when I have a chance to tell you, I go speechless.”

12. “You are my first and last thought of every day and everyone in between.”

13. “Your eyes make me shy.” – Anais Nin

14. “You see in all my life I’ve never found what I couldn’t resist, what I couldn’t turn down. I could walk away from anyone I ever knew, but I can’t walk away from you.”

15. “You don’t have to be a genius to figure what’s between us.”

16. “I’m afraid to lose you and you’re not even mine.” – Drake

17. “The spaces between your fingers are meant to be filled with mine.”

18. “Loving you is like breathing. How can I stop?”

19. “I’ll be yours forever, just tell me when to start.”

20. “Sometimes I just can’t ignore the way I feel when I see you smile.”

21. “When I see you, I admit I start to lose my grip and all of my cool.”

22. “It’s amazing how crazy I feel when my phone vibrates and I’m, begging it to be you.”

23. “Even after most said it was over between you and me, I still to this day, never shut up about you. You’ve got me wrapped around your finger.”

24. “I just had to talk with you. Sweetness is my weakness.”

25. “You can’t be real. May I pinch you to see if I’m dreaming?”

Crush Quotes About Having a Crush

1. “Why do they call it a crush? Because that’s how you feel when they don’t feel the same way in return.”

2. "It's nice to have a crush on someone. It feels like you're alive, you know?" — Scarlett Johansson

3. "Some crushes just never went away. They built, instead, into something permanent, obsessive and all-consuming." — Maya Banks

4. "The mark of a true crush... is that you fall in love first and grope for reasons afterward." — Shana Alexander

5. “Do you know what it’s like to like someone so much you can’t stand it and know that they’ll never feel the same way?” — To All the Boys I've Loved Before

6. "It’s funny how someone can seem normal to you one day only for you to realize the next day that you are in love with them. It is like a light bulb suddenly being turned on."

7. "He barely knew I existed. I knew some of the same people he knew, but I was a girl in the background, several degrees of separation removed." — Rick Yancey

8. "Creating a nickname for your crush, that only you and your friends know."

9. "Sorry boys, but I already have my eyes on a guy that isn't interested."

10. "A guy and a girl can be just friends, but at one point or another, they will fall for each other... maybe temporarily, maybe at the wrong time, maybe too late, or maybe forever."

Are you looking for fun ways to connect with your friends? Never have I ever questions for teens are a great choice for your next get-together. These questions can help break the ice and create laughter, making your time together more enjoyable.

The "Never Have I Ever" game is simple and needs no special equipment. To play, each person starts with their fingers raised—usually five or ten. One player reads a statement starting with "Never have I ever…" and describes something they've never done. If others have done it, they put one finger down. The game continues until only one person has fingers left up, making them the winner. This game is perfect for parties, gatherings, or a casual night with friends.

In this article, we have selected some of the best never have I ever questions for teens from various sources, Monday (4/11/2024). These questions can help you create memorable moments during your game.

scraped_articles.title: 5 Haunted Spots in Brighton, England, for Your Incredible Ghost Tour
scraped_articles.meta_description: These haunted spots in Brighton will pique your interest. They will leave you with a sense of wonder.
scraped_articles.content:
5 Haunted Spots in Brighton, England, for Your Incredible Ghost Tour

Photo: pinterest/AI Art

5 Haunted Spots in Brighton, England, for Your Incredible Ghost Tour

Brighton is a charming seaside town in England. Brighton is known for its stunning views, lively atmosphere, and spooky haunted spots.

Brighton is the perfect destination for you if you enjoy ghostly tales and eerie encounters. This article will explore five haunted spots in Brighton that will send shivers down your spine.

Haunted Spots in Brighton, England

1. Brighton Library

Built in 1873, the Brighton Library is said to be haunted by a ghost known as the Grey Lady.

Legend has it that she was a former librarian who tragically passed away in the building. Visitors have reported seeing her ghostly figure wandering the corridors late at night, searching for books.

2. Preston Manor

This historic manor house dates back to the 17th century.

Preston Manor is rumored to be haunted by several spirits, including a ghostly lady dressed in white. Visitors have reported hearing strange noises and feeling a chilling presence while exploring the manor's rooms and gardens.

3. Hanningtons, Brighton

Hanningtons is a famous department store in Brighton.

Hanningtons is said to be haunted by the spirit of a former employee who tragically died in the building. Visitors have reported seeing objects moving on their own and feeling a cold breeze in certain areas of the store.

wikipedia

4. St. Ann's Well Gardens

Saint Anne's Wells is located in an old underground reservoir. It is rumored to be haunted by the spirits of former workers who lost their lives during its construction. Visitors have reported hearing disembodied voices and feeling a sense of unease while exploring the dark tunnels.

5. The West Pier

It was once a bustling pier that attracted visitors from far and wide. The West Pier now stands in ruins after being ravaged by fire and storms.

Many believe that the spirits of those who perished in these tragedies still linger on the decaying structure. Visitors have reported hearing phantom footsteps. Soma also sees shadowy figures moving along the rusted remains of the pier.

Whether you believe in the supernatural or are a skeptic, these haunted spots in Brighton will pique your interest. They will leave you with a sense of wonder.

If you're feeling brave, let's take a ghostly tour of Brighton and see if you can uncover the mysteries within these eerie places. You might have a spine-tingling encounter of your own. Happy ghost hunting!


Haunted Spots in Brighton, England

scraped_articles.title: 'Facekinis' Now Popular In China Because of Extreme Heat
scraped_articles.meta_description: As temperatures soar in Beijing, people are finding creative ways to protect themselves from the scorching sun. One of them is by wearing 'facekinis'
scraped_articles.content:
'Facekinis' Now Popular In China Because of Extreme Heat

'Facekinis' Now Popular In China Because of Extreme Heat

As temperatures soar in Beijing, people are finding creative ways to beat the heat and protect themselves from the scorching sun.

With the air temperature going above 35°C (95°F) and the ground surface reaching a staggering 80°C in some areas, staying cool is a big challenge.

One new fashion trend gaining popularity is the facekini," a full-face mask with holes for the eyes and nose. People are also using separate sleeves to cover their arms, along with wide-brimmed hats and lightweight jackets made from special UV-resistant fabric.

Sales of these sun protection items have surged this year compared to previous years, according to shopkeepers. Many people, especially women in East Asia, prefer to have fair skin, so they are taking extra precautions to avoid sun damage.

Besides wanting to look good, people are also concerned about their health. The intense sun can cause skin diseases and sunspots, so covering up is essential.

In some places, like the Flaming Mountains in Xinjiang, the temperatures have been so extreme that a 12-meter-tall thermometer displayed a real-time surface temperature of 80°C.

To stay safe and cool during the heatwave, people are carrying portable fans and wearing protective gear to shield themselves from the sun's harmful rays.

scraped_articles.content:
125 Funny Short Jokes That Will Make You Laugh Out Loud

Do you enjoy a good laugh? Sometimes, a simple joke can make your day better. Funny short jokes are easy to remember and share. They bring joy and make conversations more fun. A quick joke can break the ice, lighten the mood, and create happy moments with others.

A short joke can quickly make someone smile. These jokes do not take much time to understand, and they can add humor to any moment. They work well in casual chats, text messages, or even social media posts. A little laughter can improve your mood and make your day more enjoyable.

In this article, we have selected some of the best short jokes from various sources, Friday (14/3/2025). Whether you need a quick laugh or something to share with friends, these jokes will bring smiles and joy.

The Best, Funny Short Jokes

2. What do you call a fish with no eyes? A fsh.

23. What do cows do on Saturday nights? They go to the moo-vies.

Corny Short Dad Jokes

Funny Short Jokes for Adults

scraped_articles.title: Millie Bobby Brown Appears on The Drew Barrymore Show Without Makeup!
scraped_articles.meta_description: Millie Bobby Brown Appears on The Drew Barrymore Show Without Makeup!
scraped_articles.meta_keywords: Millie Bobby Brown,the drew barrymore show,make-up,acne,face,bare face
scraped_articles.content:
Millie Bobby Brown Appears on The Drew Barrymore Show Without Makeup!

Millie Bobby Brown Appears on The Drew Barrymore Show Without Makeup!

Millie Bobby Brown appeared without makeup on The Drew Barrymore Show on Thursday, March 7, 2024. This shocked fans and netizens in general.

The cast of Seven in the Netflix series Stranger Things was present to chat and promote her latest Netflix series, Damsel. She plays the main character, Princess Elodie.

On the same day, The Drew Barrymore Show's official Instagram account shared footage from the event. In the @thedrewbarrymoreshow account upload, Millie looks relaxed and wears a purple lilac long-sleeved T-shirt, the same as Drew Barrymore wears.

She completed her look by wearing several accessories, such as a choker necklace and earrings. The most exciting thing about Millie's appearance is the butterfly-shaped acne patch on her cheek.

Over the past few years, Millie has attended various talk shows such as The Late Show with Stephen Colbert and The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon. The British actress always surprises her fans with her personality and her undoubted fashion taste.

During a chat session on The Drew Barrymore Show, Millie discussed her experience in action scenes while filming "Damsel." She also shared her experience in cinema, which she has been doing for 11 years since her debut in Once Upon A Time in Wonderland in 2013.

After playing in the first season of the series Stranger Things, which successfully raised her name in the movie scene, now she is not only present as a cast.

Millie also produced several movies, such as Enola Holmes Part 1 and 2, Godzilla: King of The Monsters, and Godzilla vs. King Kong.

"Damsel" tells the story of a noblewoman who agrees to marry a prince, only to find out that her family plans to sacrifice her to pay a past debt.

In addition to Millie Bobby Brown, the series also features names such as Ray Winstone, Angela Bassett, Brooke Carter, and Nick Robinson.

scraped_articles.title: 5 Photos of Erica Robin, Pakistan's First Miss Universe That Got Backlash
scraped_articles.meta_description: The Pakistani government was disappointed that Erica was chosen without the country's approval.
scraped_articles.content:
5 Photos of Erica Robin, Pakistan's First Miss Universe That Got Backlash

The Pakistani government was disappointed that Erica was chosen without the country's approval.

5 Photos of Erica Robin, Pakistan's First Miss Universe That Got Backlash

Erica Robin's participation in the Miss Universe Pakistan beauty pageant has sparked much debate.

Especially among conservative voices in Pakistan.

They were upset because Erica was chosen without the country's consent.

The decision to send a woman to represent Pakistan in a beauty pageant is important. That's because it rarely happens in this Muslim-majority country.

Erica Robin is a 25-year-old Christian from Karachi. She won the title of Miss Universe Pakistan after competing against four other finalists in the Maldives.

She will represent Pakistan in the Miss Universe pageant. Making this the first time in the competition's 72-year history that Pakistan has had a representative.

The Miss Universe 2023 event will happen in El Salvador in November.

R'Bonney Gabriel, the 2022 winner, will pass on her crown.

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Official Miss Universe Pakistan (@missuniversepakistan)

Responding to her win, Pakistani Senator Mushtaq Ahmed criticized the beauty pageant organizers.

Prime Minister Anwaar-ul-Haq Kakar called for an investigation into the event without Pakistan's approval. He called it a "shameful act" and an "insult and exploitation of women in Pakistan."

Erica Robin responds to the controversy. She expressed her excitement to represent Pakistan and her confusion.

"It feels great to represent Pakistan. But I don't understand where the backlash is coming from," she said.

"I think it is this idea that I would be parading in a swimsuit in a room full of men." She added.

scraped_articles.title: 5 Abandoned Places In British Columbia for a Chilling Experience
scraped_articles.meta_description: These abandoned places in British Columbia are more than just forgotten and empty buildings. They hold a rich history.
scraped_articles.meta_keywords: Abandoned Places In British Columbia,Haunted Places In British Columbia,Columbia,Haunted Place,history,creepy tales,ghost,horror,news,travel,trip
scraped_articles.content:
5 Abandoned Places In British Columbia for a Chilling Experience

5 Abandoned Places In British Columbia for a Chilling Experience

British Columbia is known for its breathtaking landscapes and lively cities. It also has fascinating abandoned places.

These forgotten locations offer a unique glimpse into the past, filled with creepy tales and a sense of mystery. Whether you are an adventurous explorer or curious about history, here are five abandoned places in British Columbia. A trip to these spots will give you a chilling experience.

Abandoned Places In British Columbia

1. Riverview Hospital, Coquitlam

First on our list is Riverview Hospital in Coquitlam. Once a mental health facility, Riverview Hospital now stands as a haunting reminder of the past.

Its crumbling buildings and leafy grounds make it easy to imagine the stories that echo within its walls. As you wander through the abandoned hallways, you can almost sense the history and feelings that once filled this place.

2. Tranquille Sanatorium, Kamloops

Next up is the Tranquille Sanatorium in Kamloops. Tranquille Sanatorium in Kamloops is another abandoned place that will send you goosebumps.

Originally built as a tuberculosis hospital, this spooky site now stands empty and forgotten.

The decaying buildings and deserted corridors offer a glimpse into the lives of those who once sought comfort here. As you explore the grounds, you can't help but wonder about the stories of resilience that linger there.

Abandoned Places In British Columbia

3. Kitsault, Alice Arm

Moving on, we come to Kitsault in the Alice Arm. This ghost town was once a thriving mining community, but now it sits abandoned and frozen in time.

The empty houses, rusty cars, and silent streets create an eerie atmosphere that is stunning and tense. 

As you walk through the town, you can't help but imagine what life was like for its ex-residents.

Abandoned Places In British Columbia

Our next stop is Stave Falls Powerhouse in Mission. This abandoned powerhouse was once the region's main source of hydroelectricity.

4. Stave Falls Powerhouse, Mission

Now, its towering turbines stand still, surrounded by an air of decay and abandonment. The remnants of machinery and control panels have a glimpse into the past. This site reminds us of the power once harnessed within these walls.

flickr/pirhan

5. Parkhurst Ghost Town

Last but not least, we have Parkhurst Ghost Town. This ghost town was once a bustling logging community in the picturesque Whistler area. However, the logging industry declined, leaving Parkhurst deserted and forgotten.

The decaying cabins and overgrown trails create a creepy atmosphere that is haunting and fascinating.

As you explore the town, you can't help but be transported back in time to imagine the bustling life that once thrived here.

Abandoned Places In British Columbia

These abandoned places in British Columbia are more than just forgotten and empty buildings. They hold a rich history and offer a glimpse into the past that is chilling. Whether you visit them for a adventure or to fulfill your curiosity, these locations will leave you with a sense of wonder for the stories they hold. So, if you're ready to take a chilling journey through history, add these BC places to your must-visit list. Step into the past and discover the untold stories waiting to be uncovered.

scraped_articles.title: Top 5 Life-Inspiring Movies You Must Watch During Downfall
scraped_articles.meta_description: Each of these films serves as a reminder that life is full of challenges, but with perseverance, hope, and the right mindset.
scraped_articles.content:
Top 5 Life-Inspiring Movies You Must Watch During Downfall

The Pursuit of Happyness (2006)

Based on the true story of Chris Gardner, this film portrays an inspiring journey of a man struggling through financial hardship, homelessness, and personal setbacks while trying to provide a better life for his son.

Will Smith’s heartfelt performance as Chris reminds us that perseverance and unwavering belief in one’s dreams can lead to success, no matter how hopeless the situation seems.

Forrest Gump (1994)

This timeless classic follows the extraordinary life of Forrest Gump, a simple man with a kind heart who unintentionally finds himself in pivotal moments of history.

Despite facing intellectual challenges and personal tragedies, Forrest continues to move forward with optimism and love.

His story teaches us that life is unpredictable, but a pure heart and determination can overcome even the toughest circumstances.

Rocky (1976)

The ultimate underdog story, Rocky follows a small-time boxer, Rocky Balboa, who gets a once-in-a-lifetime chance to fight the world champion.

More than just a sports film, Rocky emphasizes hard work, resilience, and the power of self-belief.

It shows that success isn’t about winning but about pushing forward, taking hits, and never giving up.

The Shawshank Redemption (1994)

This gripping tale of hope and endurance follows Andy Dufresne, a banker wrongly imprisoned for murder, as he navigates the harsh realities of life behind bars.

Despite decades of suffering, Andy never loses hope and carefully plots his escape to freedom.

The film’s powerful message—that hope is a powerful force that can keep the spirit alive even in the darkest times—makes it a must-watch for anyone feeling trapped in their struggles.

Good Will Hunting (1997)

This emotional drama tells the story of Will Hunting, a self-taught genius struggling with inner demons and past trauma while working as a janitor at MIT.

With the help of a compassionate therapist, played by Robin Williams, Will learns to confront his fears and embrace his potential.

The film teaches us that our past does not define our future, and healing is possible when we open ourselves to growth and genuine connections.

scraped_articles.title: 43 Weekend Quotes that Capture the Essence of Weekend Bliss
scraped_articles.meta_description: These days are precious because they give us a break from our busy schedules.
scraped_articles.content:
43 Weekend Quotes that Capture the Essence of Weekend Bliss

Many people love weekends so much that they have created "weekend quotes" to celebrate these two precious days.
Photo by Jen p. o. by unsplash

43 Weekend Quotes that Capture the Essence of Weekend Bliss

Weekends are the best part of the week for many people. After working hard all week, the weekend is a time to relax, recharge, and have fun. Many people love weekends so much that they have created "weekend quotes" to celebrate these two precious days.

These days are precious because they give us a break from our busy schedules. Weekends let us do the things we love. It’s a chance to sleep in, hang out with friends, or enjoy our favorite hobbies. Weekends also give us time to recharge and prepare for the new week ahead.

Let's explore some funny weekend quotes that capture the excitement of these precious days off.

Short and Funny Weekend Quotes

• “Weekend, please don’t leave me.”

• “Start the weekend with a smile and end it with champagne.”

• “Saturday: Coffee first, schemes later.”

• “I’m not lazy. I’m on energy-saving mode. Especially on Saturdays.”

• “Saturdays are for adventures, Sundays are for cuddling.”

• “The only plans I have for this Saturday are to turn the pages of my book.”

• “Saturday: When you can do all those things you said you’d do but won’t.”

• “Here’s to the Saturday nights that turned into Sunday mornings with the friends that turned into family.”

• “On Saturdays, we wear pajamas.” – A playful twist on “Mean Girls”

• “I’ve got a weekend vibe and a dozen things I pretended I’d do.”

• “Saturday night’s alright for fighting… or Netflix. Mostly Netflix.”

• “The only reason I ask what you did over the weekend is so I can tell you what I did over the weekend.”

• “The weekend is a time when coffee is recreational.”

• “Can we start the weekend over again? I wasn’t ready.”

• “Weekend forecast: lazy with a 90% chance of Netflix.”

• “The first five days after the weekend are the hardest.”

• “Sunday: The day I planned a lot but actually do nothing.” – Lovely Goyal

• "Weekends are a diet's arch-nemesis. The calories know no bounds."

• "Weekend rule: If it smells like food, eat it."

• “The only Happy END that I know: it’s the weekEND!”
• “I like my women like I like my weekend – short, filled with liquor and gone by Monday.”
• “If weekends were longer, I might be able to get more sleep.”
• “Whoever invented the weekend deserves a high five.”
• “My favorite weekend activity is riding the couch.”
• "Saturday brunch is the most important meal of the week. Just kidding; they're all important."

• “The weekends are too short for sleep!” – Bryant A. Loney

• "Weekends are for cheat days and extra desserts. It's a scientific fact."

• "My favorite weekend exercise is a cross between a lunge and a crunch. I call it lunch."

• “Weekends don’t count unless you spend them doing something completely pointless.” – Bill Watterson

Inspirational Weekend Quotes

• “Leave behind the worries of previous days and step into a weekend full of only good vibes and happy ends.”

• "Weekends are the proof that life is precious and moments are meant to be celebrated."

“If you find yourself waiting for the weekend to approach, then it means that you are not happy for at least five days a week.” – Rakshit Shetty.

• “You have to be burning with an idea, or a problem, or a wrong that you want to right. If you’re not passionate enough from the start, you’ll never stick it out.” – Steve Jobs


• “As the week’s hard work winds down, let the prospect of a lovely weekend put a smile on your face. It’s time for some well-deserved rest!”

Weekend Quotes

• "Do more things that make you forget to check your phone. Like having a weekend adventure!"

• "Weekends are a reminder that life is meant to be lived, enjoyed, and savored."

• "Weekends are a celebration of life and the freedom to chase your passions."

• "Typically a weekend retreat for the heart, soul and palate, brunch is the perfect way to unwind and reconnect.” – Marcela Valladolid

• “As the working week melts away, remember that the weekend is a precious gift where you can create the best stories and make every moment count.”

• “When the lovely weekend knocks on your door, leave behind the stresses of hard work and embrace the opportunity to have fun and make lasting memories.”

• "Embrace the magic that your weekend holds – the freedom to do whatever sets your soul on fire."

scraped_articles.title: 450 Smooth Pick Up Lines with Rizz to Impress Your Crush
scraped_articles.meta_description: Here are 450 clever and charming pick up lines with rizz to help you break the ice and win over that special someone.
scraped_articles.content:
450 Smooth Pick Up Lines with Rizz to Impress Your Crush

Looking for some smooth lines to impress your crush? You’ve come to the right place! Here are 450 clever and charming pick up lines with rizz to help you break the ice and win over that special someone:

Funny Pick Up Lines

Make them laugh with these humorous lines:

1. Are you a magician? Because when I look at you, everyone else disappears.

2. Do you have a map? I keep getting lost in your eyes.

3. Are you a parking ticket? Because you’ve got FINE written all over you.

4. I’m not a photographer, but I can picture us together.

5. Are you a bank loan? Because you’ve got my interest.

6. Do you like raisins? How about a date?

7. Are you religious? Because you’re the answer to all my prayers.

8. Do you have a Band-Aid? I just scraped my knee falling for you.

9. I’m no mathematician, but I’m pretty good with numbers. Can I get yours?

10. Are you a campfire? Because you’re hot and I want s’more.

Smooth Pick Up Lines

Try these suave lines to charm your crush:

11. I was feeling a bit off today, but you definitely turned me on.

12. Are you a time traveler? Because I see you in my future.

13. Excuse me, I think you dropped something: my jaw.

14. I must be a snowflake, because I’ve fallen for you.

15. If you were a vegetable, you’d be a cute-cumber.

16. Do you have a name, or can I call you mine?

17. I’m not drunk, I’m just intoxicated by you.

18. Are you French? Because Eiffel for you.

19. I’m not a genie, but I can make your dreams come true.

20. If being sexy was a crime, you’d be guilty as charged.

Clever Pick Up Lines

Show off your wit with these smart lines:

21. Are you made of copper and tellurium? Because you’re Cu-Te.

22. Do you have 11 protons? Because you’re sodium fine.

23. Are you a 90-degree angle? Because you’re looking right.

24. If I had a star for every time you brightened my day, I’d have a galaxy in my hand.

415. Are you chocolate? Because you melt my heart.

416. Do you believe in love at first bite? Because you look delicious.

417. Are you a sundae? Because you’ve got all my favorite toppings.

418. If our love were a dessert, what would it be?

419. Are you a pastry chef? Because you’ve baked your way into my heart.

420. Do you like pie? Because you’re as sweet as can be.

Ocean-Related Pick Up Lines

Dive into love with these aquatic lines:

421. Are you the ocean? Because you’re deep and mysterious.

422. Do you like swimming? Because I’m drowning in your eyes.

423. Are you a mermaid? Because you’re the catch of my dreams.

424. If love were a beach, you’d be my paradise.

425. Are you a wave? Because you’ve swept me off my feet.

426. Do you believe in sea monsters? Because you’re monstrously attractive.

427. Are you a seashell? Because you’re a rare find.

428. If our love were an ocean, how deep would it be?

429. Are you a lighthouse? Because you guide me home.

430. Do you like sailing? Because I’d navigate any storm for you.

Seasonal Pick Up Lines

Change with the seasons using these timely lines:

431. Are you autumn? Because you’re falling for me.

432. Do you like winter? Because you’ve melted my frozen heart.

433. Are you spring? Because you bring new life to my world.

434. If love were a season, you’d be an endless summer.

435. Are you a snowflake? Because you’re beautiful and unique.

436. Do you believe in seasonal love? Because I’d choose you all year round.

437. Are you a flower? Because you bloom in my heart.

438. If our love were a season, which one would it be?

439. Are you sunshine? Because you brighten my darkest days.

440. Do you like changing leaves? Because you’ve changed my life for the better.

Conclusion

There you have it – 450 pick up lines with rizz to help you break the ice and make a great impression. Remember, confidence is key when delivering these lines. Use them wisely and have fun!

441. Are you a conclusion? Because you’ve wrapped up my search for love.

442. Do you like happy endings? Because I think we could write one together.

443. Are you the last page of a book? Because you’ve left me wanting more.

444. If love were a story, you’d be my favorite chapter.

445. Are you a period? Because you’ve brought my search to a perfect end.

446. Do you believe in fate? Because I think we were meant to meet.

447. Are you a sunset? Because you’re the perfect end to my day.

448. If our love were a movie, this would be the start of something beautiful.

449. Are you a final thought? Because you’re all I can think about.

450. Do you like new beginnings? Because I think this is the start of something special.

scraped_articles.content:
Memorable Beth Dutton Quotes to Conquer Challenges

Memorable Beth Dutton Quotes to Conquer Challenges

Welcome to a world filled with inspirational quotes from the fierce and powerful character Beth Dutton. If you're a fan of "Yellowstone," you know Beth Dutton is a character who's as tough as they come. But beyond her fierce manners, Beth is also full of wisdom.

In this article, we'll explore some inspirational Beth Dutton quotes that can motivate and empower you, no matter your challenges. Beth Dutton Quotes are more than words on a screen; they're powerful reminders of strength.

So, get ready to be inspired by these memorable Beth Dutton quotes.

Beth Dutton Quotes to Make You Work Harder

1. "You want to lose less? Stop losing. You want to make more? Work more."

2. "I’m not here to make friends. I’m here to make money."

3. "If you don’t like the way we do things, I suggest you get the hell out of here."

4. "I’ll be damned if I’m going to feel like a victim for surviving."

5. "Everything good I’ve ever done, I’ve done for this family."

6. "Being a warrior is living the life you want, not the one you’re given."

7. "I don't have dreams, I have plans."

8. “You learn, you fail; learn more, fail more. And don’t let anyone outwork you, ever.”

9. "You know, there's a saying in politics: 'The only thing worse than an enemy is a lazy friend.'"

10. "I don't enjoy much, but I enjoy what I do."

11. "Fate gave me a house of my own. I don't owe you."

12. "You don't get what you deserve, you get what you take."

13. "Being scared ain't a reason not to do something."


14. “I love how people think that word entitles them to absolution from the people whose lives they ruin. We owe you nothing.”

15. "Life is like poker, you gotta know when to hold 'em and when to fold 'em."

Beth Dutton Quotes About Life

1. “I have been down this road many, many times before, buddy. And no one who tried it is alive to tell you how poorly that worked out for them.”

2. "You’re too smart to let emotion guide you."

3. “When you go to war with someone, you want them emotional. You want them angry. The more they feel, the less they think.”

4. “I believe in loving with your whole soul and destroying anything that wants to kill what you love. That’s it. That’s all there is.”

5. "You want to judge me? Go ahead. Just do it from a distance."

6. "You want respect, show it."

7. "Being a rancher is a state of mind."

8. "We don't need a lot of friends, just a few good ones."

9. “I made two decisions in my life based on fear, and they cost me everything.”

10. "The truth always comes out. Might as well be from my mouth."

11. "Sometimes the only way to save the thing you love is to burn it to the ground."

12. "I'm not looking for the path of least resistance, Jack. I'm looking for the path of least bullshit."

13. “Well, that’s what it means. It means that you have me—that I’m yours. It means come live your life with me. The only thing I ask is that you outlive me, so I never live another day without you.”

14. “Make me a promise. Don’t ever let them do that to me. Turn me to ashes and throw me into the wind. That’s all the care I want.”

15. “The sting never fades with me. It is a painful lesson and one you’re about to learn.”

16. "Life is short. Drive fast. Leave a sexy corpse."

17. "Some people take the peace and make it violence. Some people take the violence and make it peace."

18. “I see things in people, and I feel like if I can touch it, even if the rest of the person is rotten, I can take that good thing, and I can make it part of me.”

19. "It’s not easy being a Dutton. It’s not easy being anything."

20. “Here’s all the things I don’t believe. I don’t believe you’re capable of swallowing your pride and contributing to this family. I don’t believe our father will ever trust you again, which is why I don’t believe you have a role here anymore.”

21. "Don't let them see your hands shaking."

22. “Where’s the rattlesnake in the deal? I am the rattlesnake. But you’re not who I’m gonna bite.”

Despite these memorable Beth Dutton quotes, her character has some qualities that aren't good for young girls to copy, like using foul language and trying to control others.

But nobody's perfect. Even though Beth has flaws, they're a part of who she is and help shape her into someone we look up to.

Author: Larasati Natasha (Intern)
